I would agree with Saeed's comments. Another common spelling is Syed. 

One will note of the individuals that are specifically wearing turbans (as opposed to the fez type) that some of the individuals are wearing black turbans and some are wearing white. The black turbans are a distinction among the scholars as who is a decendent of the Prophet Muhammad (pbuh) through his daughter Lady Fatimah Zahra (as).
